description.english: Be caught into castle by goblins.
Kill 500 monsters with a two-handed sword.
description.schinese: 使用双手剑击杀500只怪物.

description.english: Kill 500 monsters with a single-handed sword.
description.schinese: 使用单手剑击杀500只怪物.

description.english: Enter earl's secret chamber, and accomplish the first playthrough.
description.schinese: 进入伯爵密室，达成一周目通关.
通过献祭恶魔灵魂达到10级.
通过献祭恶魔灵魂达到30级.

description.english: Be revived by Badge of Rebirth.
Be saved by Protector of Life.
Accomplish final evolution of Ghost Armor.
description.schinese: 幽灵仆从进化成幽灵护卫.

description.english: Drink Ignition Potion, and set fire to everywhere.
description.schinese: 喝下燃烧药水，到处纵火.

description.english: Drink Cathartic Potion, and poo everywhere.
Drink Fart Potion, and fart everywhere.

displayName.english: Did you see my little dino ?
It eat up ALL of my meat !!

description.english: Feed the baby dinosaur to become adult.
Pick up Evil mirror and generate another self.
3 spirits follow you at the same time.
Record over 250 kinds of weapons and armor.
description.schinese: 收集武器和装备图鉴超过250种.

description.english: Record over 85 kinds of monsters in the castle.
description.schinese: 收集怪物和Boss图鉴超过85种..

description.english: Record over 145 kinds of items and treasures.
description.schinese: 收集道具宝藏图鉴超过145种.

description.english: Defeat Death Asura WITHOUT breaking any of its hands.
description.schinese: 在不击碎任何一只手的情况下打败死亡修罗.

description.english: Destroy Goblin king's fortress ONLY with bombs.
description.schinese: 只使用炸弹打败哥布林国王（要塞）.
击败首领:被遗忘的领主.
击败首领:被遗忘的莉莉丝.
